characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant until a year ago. Now she's training to be a spirit medium.
characters.description2: The defendant, and my client. Was arrested on suspicion of murder while channeling.

characters.name: Dr. Turner Grey
characters.description1: The director of the Grey Surgical Clinic where the malpractice incident occurred.
characters.description2: Grey Surgical Clinic Director. Had a malpractice incident. Murdered during a channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Ran away as soon as she saw me. A girl who is Maya's little cousin.
characters.description2: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Morgan Fey
characters.description1: Maya's aunt. She has a strange, powerful aura about her.
characters.description2: Maya's aunt. A member of the Fey clan branch family. She is the mother of Pearl.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. She lives for the next big scoop.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Ini Miney
characters.description1: College student. A huge fan of the occult and is doing research in parapsychology.
characters.description2: College student. Researching parapsychology. Older sister, Mimi, died in a car accident.

characters.name: Mimi Miney
characters.description1: Died in a car accident 1 year ago. Was Ini's older sister, nurse at Dr. Grey's clinic.

characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Maya's older sister. She was a top notch lawyer and my mentor and friend forever.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: Became a prosecutor in Germany at age 13. A prodigy who has never known defeat.

characters.name: Ami Fey
characters.description1: Kurain Channeling Technique founder. Legend says her soul is sealed in the Sacred Urn.

characters.name: Director Hotti (purported)
characters.description1: A peculiar patient who claims to be Director Hotti. Seems to be extremely "healthy".

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Guidemap (Fey Manor)
evidences.description1: A diagram of Fey Manor. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.description1: Slightly translucent. It's small, but it has a deep, profound aura about it.
evidences.description2: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.

evidences.name: Newspaper Clipping 1
evidences.obtained: Retrieved at the Wright & Co. Law Offices.
evidences.description1: One year ago on May 2nd, 14 patients died from malpractice at Grey Surgical Clinic.

evidences.name: Folding Screen
evidences.description1: About 8 inches off the ground is a small hole that looks like a bullet hole.

evidences.name: Black Key
evidences.description1: An old steel key. A green jewel is set in the center of the key's grip.

evidences.name: Newspaper Clipping 2
evidences.obtained: Received from Detective Gumshoe.  → Received from Director Hotti.
evidences.description1: Mimi Miney, nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic, died after falling asleep at the wheel.
evidences.description2: Articles about the car accident. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Floor Plans (Crime Scene)
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
evidences.description1: A diagram of the Channeling Chamber. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Dr. Grey's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: After being stabbed in the chest, he was shot in the forehead at point-blank.
evidences.description2: Stabbed in chest then shot at point-blank. Gunpowder residue around bullet hole.

evidences.name: Pistol
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Murder weapon. Was Grey's. Two shots fired. Bears Maya's and Grey's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Knife
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Murder weapon. A small fruit knife. Belongs to the Fey's. Bears Maya's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Maya's Costume
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. There are blood splatters on it.
evidences.description2: Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Lotta's Photo 1
evidences.description1: A picture taken at the murder scene. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Lotta's Photo 2
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: A picture taken at the murder scene. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Sacred Urn
evidences.description1: Ami Fey's spirit is sealed within. It's chipped and cracked all over.
evidences.description2: Broken by Pearl right before the murder. Under repair in the hallway until police came.

evidences.name: Cloth Scrap
evidences.description1: Unburned remains found inside the garden incinerator. Small amount of blood is on it.

evidences.name: Pearl's Ball
evidences.description1: Pearl's favorite toy. She was playing with this at the time of the murder, it seems.

evidences.name: Clothing Box
evidences.description1: There is a hole that looks like a bullet hole about 8 inches off the ground.

evidences.name: License Photo
evidences.description1: Ini's photo for her driver's license. Director Hotti's treasured possession.
